mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, BOARD.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.NAME, B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, B.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, U.PROVIDER_ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FILE F WHERE F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) AS FILE_COUNT FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_USERS U ON U.PROVIDER_ID = B.PROVIDER_ID ORDER BY B.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC ) BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rn > #{startRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_VIEWS, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, PROVIDER_ID) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{providerId})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, U.NAME, B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, U.PROVIDER_ID FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_USERS U ON U.PROVIDER_ID = B.PROVIDER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET BOARD_VIEWS = BOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.NAME, B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, B.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, U.PROVIDER_ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FILE F WHERE F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) AS FILE_COUNT FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_USERS U ON U.PROVIDER_ID = B.PROVIDER_ID ORDER BY B.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE ASC
